channel.title: Can't kill npcs?
channel.description: All the NPC's on my server will not die. I've used glowing dagger etc on them, and knock off all their hitpoints. But they still won't die. Help please? I'm using Hiyascape v2 source, and this has never happened before :S

item.title: Can't kill npcs?
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Whatever you did when they started doing this undo it and pay close attention to the steps you take especially if it envolves npchandler.java or any other npc text document. Just make sure you understand what you’re doing before you do it. I’ve never used Hiyascape so i’m not to sure but that is the only advice i can give you.

Ps: It wouldn’t be npc.cfg adog17x, he would know if he set the npc hp up, and it sounds like it every npc so i doubt that the solution

Read full topic

item.title: Can't kill npcs?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

go in Npc.cfg, find there name and change their hp lvl
